Deprecated API

Contents

  • Enums
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Enums 
    Enum Description
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.Color
    Use ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor instead!

    A color used by the ColoredOutput methods.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    i5.las2peer.api.Context.registerReceiver​(MessageReceiver)
    i5.las2peer.api.security.PassphraseAgent.unlockPrivateKey​(String)
    This is just an alias for PassphraseAgent.unlock(String) and will be removed in near future. Unlocks this agent.
    i5.las2peer.logging.L2pLogger.log​(Long, MonitoringEvent, String, String, String, String, String)
    Use L2pLogger.log(Long, MonitoringEvent, String, String, String, String, String) instead. The coupling between nodes and services is softened now.
    i5.las2peer.logging.L2pLogger.logEvent​(MonitoringEvent, String)
    Use Context.monitorEvent(MonitoringEvent, String) Writes a log message. The given event can be used to differentiate between different log messages.
    i5.las2peer.p2p.LocalNode.fetchArtifact​(long)
    Use LocalNode.fetchEnvelope(String) instead
    i5.las2peer.p2p.LocalNode.removeArtifact​(long, byte[])
    Use LocalNode.removeEnvelope(String) instead
    i5.las2peer.p2p.LocalNode.storeArtifact​(EnvelopeVersion)
    Use LocalNode.storeEnvelope(EnvelopeVersion, AgentImpl) instead
    i5.las2peer.p2p.LocalNode.updateAgent​(AgentImpl)
    i5.las2peer.p2p.Node.fetchArtifact​(long)
    Use NodeStorageInterface.fetchEnvelope(String) instead Gets an artifact from the p2p storage.
    i5.las2peer.p2p.Node.removeArtifact​(long, byte[])
    Use L2pStorageInterface.removeEnvelope(String) instead Removes an artifact from the p2p storage. NOTE: This is not possible with a FreePastry backend!
    i5.las2peer.p2p.Node.storeArtifact​(EnvelopeVersion)
    Use NodeStorageInterface.storeEnvelope(EnvelopeVersion, AgentImpl) instead Stores an artifact to the p2p storage.
    i5.las2peer.p2p.Node.updateAgent​(AgentImpl)
    i5.las2peer.p2p.PastryNodeImpl.fetchArtifact​(long)
    Use PastryNodeImpl.fetchEnvelope(String) instead
    i5.las2peer.p2p.PastryNodeImpl.removeArtifact​(long, byte[])
    Use PastryNodeImpl.removeEnvelope(String) instead
    i5.las2peer.p2p.PastryNodeImpl.storeArtifact​(EnvelopeVersion)
    Use PastryNodeImpl.storeEnvelope(EnvelopeVersion, AgentImpl) instead
    i5.las2peer.p2p.PastryNodeImpl.updateAgent​(AgentImpl)
    Use PastryNodeImpl.storeAgent(AgentImpl) instead
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.CommunityTagIndex.deploy​(Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger)
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.CommunityTagIndex.load​(String, Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger)
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.ReputationRegistry.deploy​(Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger, String)
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.ReputationRegistry.load​(String, Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger)
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.ServiceRegistry.deploy​(Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger, String)
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.ServiceRegistry.load​(String, Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger)
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.UserRegistry.deploy​(Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger)
    i5.las2peer.registry.contracts.UserRegistry.load​(String, Web3j, Credentials, BigInteger, BigInteger)
    i5.las2peer.registry.ReadOnlyRegistryClient.getEthClientVersion()
    there's no reason to reveal this implementation detail, so this may be removed
    i5.las2peer.registry.ReadWriteRegistryClient.sendEther​(String, String, BigInteger)
    i5.las2peer.security.Mediator.invoke​(String, String, Serializable[], boolean)
    i5.las2peer.security.ServiceAgentImpl.createServiceAgent​(String, String)
    i5.las2peer.security.ServiceAgentImpl.generateNewAgent​(String, String)
    Please use ServiceAgentImpl.createServiceAgent(ServiceNameVersion, String) instead
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.backgroundBlack()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.BackgroundColor.Black instead!

    switch background to black

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.BackgroundColor.Blue instead!

    switch background to blue

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.Formatting.Bold instead!

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Black instead!

    switch to black font color

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Blue instead!

    switch to blue font color
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.fontBrown()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) another ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor instead!

    switch to brown font color
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.fontCyan()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Cyan instead!

    switch to cyan font color

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.DarkGrey instead!

    switch to dark grey font color

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Green instead!

    switch to green font color

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.LightBlue instead!

    switch to light blue font color
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.fontLightCyan()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.LightCyan instead!

    switch to lighty cyan font color
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.fontLightGreen()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.LightGreen instead!

    switch to light green font color

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.LightGrey instead!

    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Red instead!

    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.fontReset()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Default instead!

    reset to terminal default
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.fontWhite()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.White instead!

    switch to white font color
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.fontYellow()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Yellow instead!

    switch to yellow font color
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.inverted()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.Formatting.Reverse instead!

    write inverted (swap back- and foreground color)
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.noBlink()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.Formatting.ResetBlink instead!

    turn off blinking text
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.noBold()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.Formatting.ResetBold instead!

    turn off bold text
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.print​(Object)
    This method is deprecated and will be removed in the future!

    print some text to the selected printstream
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.println​(String, ColoredOutput.Color)
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with a ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor instead!

    print a text in the given color
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.printlnBold​(String)
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.Formatting.Bold instead!

    print a line of bold text
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.printlnRed​(String)
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Red instead!

    print a line of red text
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.printlnYellow​(String)
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.ForegroundColor.Yellow instead!

    print a line of yellow text
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.reset()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.Formatting.ResetAll instead!

    simple reset the console to standard (colors and shape)
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.resetBackground()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.BackgroundColor.Default instead!

    reset background to terminal default
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.sendCode​(int)
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) instead!

    write a bash code
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.underline()
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) with ColoredOutput.Formatting.Underlined instead!

    write underlined text
    i5.las2peer.tools.ColoredOutput.useStream​(PrintStream)
    Use ColoredOutput.colorize(String, ShellCode...) instead!

    switch the stream to use for output
    i5.las2peer.tools.L2pNodeLauncher.launchSingle​(Iterable<String>)
    Use L2pNodeLauncher.launchConfiguration(L2pNodeLauncherConfiguration) instead. Launches a single node.
    i5.las2peer.tools.L2pNodeLauncher.startNodeAdminConnector()
    Use L2pNodeLauncher.startWebConnector() instead.
    i5.las2peer.tools.L2pNodeLauncher.stopNodeAdminConnector()
    Use L2pNodeLauncher.stopWebConnector() instead.
